subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Several high-profile players, including the Steelers’ Ben Roethlisberger, who sat out a 20-17 overtime defeat because of head injuries, and Roger Goodell directly addressed the issue.
snippet: Several high-profile players, including the Steelers’ Ben Roethlisberger, who sat out a 20-17 overtime defeat because of head injuries, and Roger Goodell directly addressed the issue.
